allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
PST Email RAG Bot - Full implementation

Features:
- PST file parsing and email extraction with attachment processing
- RAG-based chat with multi-LLM support \(OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Groq, xAI\)
- Vector embeddings using sentence-transformers
- PostgreSQL database with ChromaDB vector store
- Real-time WebSocket updates for processing status
- JWT authentication with role-based access
- Docker containerized deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
